name: Samurai Shogun
description:
Slay thousands of dragons and goblins!!

Become a millionaire with loot around every corner!!

Upgrade your blade and summon dragons to become unstoppable!!

--------------------CONTROLS---------------------

WASD >> Movement

Mouse >> Attack

TAB >> Shop

Follow us on our game dev journey
